column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Ordered for delivery to my hotel. Easy ordering
column4: and they even brought me a plate
column6: pepper flakes and Parmesan! I ordered a personal deep dish and it was good. I highly recommend getting the butter crust because you can taste the difference. It came with lots of cheese and abundant toppings. The tomato sauce was bland though. It tasted like it's missing something like maybe some salt? That's why I gave it only 4/5 stars. Overall it was a good pizza and I'd highly recommend!
